original_title: Emerald unveils exquisite men’s wear store in Wattala
original_body_lines: Emerald, Sri Lanka’s leading menswear brand, expanded its retail footprint with the opening of its latest store. Located on the 4th floor of the Damro Building, Wattala, the new store is a spacious and modern retail space that offers complete menswear solutions, including shirts, trousers, and fashion accessories.

The Wattala store will offer the entire range of Emerald menswear products, along with other brands such as Leonardo, RUNN, Focus, and Mansak. With the opening of this new store, Emerald aims to provide its customers with a quality shopping experience, enabling them to avail themselves of a wider range of complete menswear solutions under one roof, and offering them their choice of fashion with ease and comfort while ensuring that they get the right pick and fit.

Commenting on the opening, the Managing Director of Emerald International, A F M Ikram said, “At Emerald, we are committed to providing the Sri Lankan gentlemen with quality, comfort, and style. The new Wattala store is an important milestone in our journey to empower men and create a platform for all Gentlemen in Sri Lanka to elevate their style and identity.”
